mapper.select:
SELECT br.no, br.user_no AS userNo, br.broadcast_no AS broadcastNo, br.reason_code AS reason, br.detail_reason AS detailReason, br.created_at AS createdAt FROM broadcast_report br WHERE br.status = 0
ORDER BY br.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE lawyer SET point = point - 30 WHERE no = ( SELECT b.user_no FROM broadcast b JOIN broadcast_report br ON b.no = br.broadcast_no WHERE b.no = #{broadcastNo} AND br.status = 0 LIMIT 1 )
UPDATE broadcast_report SET status = 1 WHERE broadcast_no = #{broadcastNo} AND status = 0
